content: Hold up there, scout! Ain't nobody making bombs and feeding ammunition to insurgents in churches and temples. This story heads up the need to have Louis Farrakhan and the Nation of Islam demonstrate their patriotism by infiltrating the FBI so that somebody in that organization has a clue about what they're doing. As it is, they're victimized by every fitness instructor, or personal development guru who needs a few bucks. "Like, tell me, Achmed, how would I get to blow something? Up I mean. If I was a ninjavitus, or whatever, that is" "Good stuff! Are ya getting all this on tape, Wally?"
